page.title: 11CHILDS ATTITUDES TO CLUB DAY
page.content: This year I was chosen to be Bower Carrier with the Rose Queen (Rachel Hull)I was chosen as I was one of those who attended the C of E Sunday School the most.My dress contrasted with the Rose Queens,it was a white flowery material with matching gloves,headress and velvet belt.The Bower was a wooden structure,painted white with four poles for us to hold.It was beautifully decorated with paper flowers and gold lettering which said- HOLY TRINITY ROSE QUEEN and the Rose Queen walked in the middle of it with her trainbearers holding no-tugging,at her cape.Whilst walking we were told endlessly by nagging Rachel to"keep that stupid Bower straight"Honestly she didn't know how much the flippin' Bower weighed!"
